medicalHistory.title: Patient reports difficulty breathing and wheezing
medicalHistory.historyOfPresentingComplaints: The patient complains of increasing shortness of breath and wheezing throughout the day, exacerbated by a known allergen exposure earlier in the morning.
medicalHistory.historyOfPresentingIllness: Ms. Jones has a known history of asthma, typically well-controlled with medication. Symptoms worsened today after exposure to pollen.
medicalHistory.familyHistory: Mother has asthma, brother has eczema.
medicalHistory.drugHistory: Uses inhaled corticosteroid daily, salbutamol as needed.
medicalHistory.allergies: Allergic to pollen and dust mites.
medicalHistory.socioeconomicHistory: Lives with her husband and two children.

generalPhysicalExamination.Notes: Patient using accessory muscles to breathe

examination.respiratorySystem: Audible wheezes, decreased air entry bilaterally.
